title: Most Popular Product
description: Write a query to find the most ordered product (by total quantity). Display name and total_quantity.
hint: Join products with order_items, use SUM on quantity, GROUP BY product name, and ORDER BY with LIMIT.
solution: SELECT products.name, SUM(order_items.quantity) as total_quantity FROM products INNER JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id GROUP BY products.name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 1
